name: @gerhobbelt/platform
description: A platform detection library that works on nearly all JavaScript platforms.
author: Benjamin Tan <demoneaux@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run doc && npm test && npm run dist
scripts.doc-orig: docdown platform.js doc/README.md style=github title="Platform.js <sup>v${npm_package_version}</sup>" toc=properties url=https://github.com/GerHobbelt/platform.js/blob/${npm_package_version}/platform.js
scripts.doc: docdown platform.js doc/README.md style=github title="Platform.js v1.1.1-1" toc=properties url=https://github.com/GerHobbelt/platform.js/blob/master/platform.js && gulp patch-version
scripts.dist: uglifyjs platform.js -o platform.min.js  && uglifyjs platform.js -o platform.pack.js --compress --mangle
